item.description:
Welcome to the Monday Happy Hours series!

This event is open to all, especially those who hate Mondays and especially for those who want to check out the different bar scenes in New Haven.

This week's location is:

Press 200 - One of New Haven's newest restaurants/lounges. I went there for dinner the other night, and I was really impressed. It is the perfect place to linger over a glass of wine or cocktail and talk to friends (they also have several beers, I should add). The food was also wonderful - they offer a 'small plates' menu with a wide variety of styles of food (and prices lol - so don't be too scared by the fancy decor). Speaking of the setting though - some of you may remember nikitta's(sp?), which is the restaurant that used to be in that same space. They had good food, and a pretty good atmosphere, but the space itself was broken up in a disjointed way, and the colors were a bit dark. Now they've literally knocked down a a wall or two to make it spacious, sexy and warm. I can't wait for everyone to come and see it : )

The wonderful event coordinator Sasha is giving us some fabulous deals. They've graciously offered to extend their normal great happy hour deals just for us from 6pm-???(when we leave) (because they're cool like that).

The specials are:

$4 House Wine

Their ENTIRE specialty cocktail menu.... $4 each (woo hoo!)

The Pear-Tini
Decadent Chocolate
Apple Pucker
Cherry-Tini
Orange Mojito
Firtini
Classic Margarita

http://press200.com...

I personally can't wait until Monday. Your contact for this event is Devorah (dev), and my # will be in my RSVP.

Hope to see you all there!

Come early, come late, leave early, stay late, everyone is always welcome...

Nothing ever cancels Monday Happy Hours. Ever.

***Bring a friend***
